author: Albert Einstein
text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
text: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.

author: Steve Jobs
text: Stay hungry, stay foolish.

author: Nelson Mandela
text: It always seems impossible until it’s done.

author: Mark Twain
text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

author: Lao Tzu
text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.

author: Benjamin Franklin
text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.

author: Aristotle
text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

author: William Shakespeare
text: To be, or not to be, that is the question.

author: Confucius
text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

author: Desmond Tutu
text: Do your little bit of good where you are; it’s those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.

author: Elon Musk
text: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

author: John F. Kennedy
text: Ask not what your country can do for you — ask what you can do for your country.

author: Walt Disney
text: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

author: Oscar Wilde
text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

author: Mother Teresa
text: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.

author: Franz Kafka
text: Paths are made by walking.

author: George Bernard Shaw
text: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

author: Plato
text: The beginning is the most important part of the work.

author: Henry Ford
text: Whether you think you can, or you think you can’t – you’re right.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
text: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
text: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.

author: Theodore Roosevelt
text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.

author: Charles Dickens
text: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burden of it for anyone else.

author: Abraham Lincoln
text: Whatever you are, be a good one.

author: Rumi
text: What you seek is seeking you.

author: Maya Angelou
text: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.

author: Dalai Lama
text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

author: Thomas Edison
text: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.

author: Bruce Lee
text: Absorb what is useful, discard what is not, add what is uniquely your own.

author: Helen Keller
text: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.

author: Martin Luther King Jr.
text: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear.

author: Stephen Hawking
text: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.

author: Winston Churchill
text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

author: J.K. Rowling
text: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

author: Sun Tzu
text: In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.

author: C.S. Lewis
text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

author: Mark Zuckerberg
text: The biggest risk is not taking any risk.

author: Oprah Winfrey
text: Turn your wounds into wisdom.

author: Peter Drucker
text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

author: Stephen Covey
text: The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.

author: Richard Branson
text: Business opportunities are like buses; there’s always another one coming.

author: Bill Gates
text: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.

author: Tony Robbins
text: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.

author: Jeff Bezos
text: A brand for a company is like a reputation for a person. You earn reputation by trying to do hard things well.

author: Vince Lombardi
text: Winners never quit and quitters never win.

author: Jim Rohn
text: Either you run the day or the day runs you.

author: Brian Tracy
text: Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you.

author: Simon Sinek
text: People don’t buy what you do; they buy why you do it.

author: Reid Hoffman
text: If you are not embarrassed by the first version of your product, you’ve launched too late.

author: Chris Guillebeau
text: You don’t have to live your life the way other people expect you to.

author: Naval Ravikant
text: Play long-term games with long-term people.

author: Gary Vaynerchuk
text: Skills are cheap. Passion is priceless.

author: Howard Schultz
text: In life, you can’t have everything. But you can have the things that really matter to you.

author: Jack Ma
text: Never give up. Today is hard, tomorrow will be worse, but the day after tomorrow will be sunshine.

author: Sheryl Sandberg
text: Done is better than perfect.

author: Serena Williams
text: A champion is defined not by their wins but by how they can recover when they fall.

author: Usain Bolt
text: Don’t think about the start of the race, think about the ending.

author: Michael Jordan
text: I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.

author: Kobe Bryant
text: The moment you give up is the moment you let someone else win.

author: LeBron James
text: Don’t be afraid of failure. This is the way to succeed.

author: Cristiano Ronaldo
text: Your love makes me strong, your hate makes me unstoppable.

author: Lionel Messi
text: You have to fight to reach your dream. You have to sacrifice and work hard for it.

author: Pele
text: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice, and most of all, love of what you are doing.

author: Muhammad Ali
text: Don’t count the days, make the days count.

author: Babe Ruth
text: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.

author: Wayne Gretzky
text: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.

author: Tom Brady
text: I didn’t come this far to only come this far.

author: Roger Federer
text: There is no way around hard work. Embrace it.

author: Novak Djokovic
text: I always try to adjust to the situation, to the opponent, to the surface.

author: Rafael Nadal
text: The success is not winning, it is making sure you do everything you can.

author: Tiger Woods
text: The greatest thing about tomorrow is, I will be better than I am today.

author: Phil Knight
text: Play by the rules, but be ferocious.

author: Richard Feynman
text: The first principle is that you must not fool yourself — and you are the easiest person to fool.

author: Carl Sagan
text: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
text: The good thing about science is that it’s true whether or not you believe in it.

author: Marie Curie
text: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood.

author: Isaac Newton
text: If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.

author: Galileo Galilei
text: You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him find it within himself.

author: Nicola Tesla
text: The present is theirs; the future, for which I really worked, is mine.

author: Alan Turing
text: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.

author: Tim Berners-Lee
text: The Web does not just connect machines, it connects people.

author: Grace Hopper
text: The most dangerous phrase in the language is, ‘We’ve always done it this way.’

author: Dennis Ritchie
text: UNIX is basically a simple operating system, but you have to be a genius to understand the simplicity.

author: Linus Torvalds
text: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.

author: Steve Wozniak
text: Never trust a computer you can’t throw out a window.

author: Satya Nadella
text: Our industry does not respect tradition. It only respects innovation.

author: Sundar Pichai
text: Wear your failure as a badge of honor.

author: Marissa Mayer
text: I always did something I was a little not ready to do.

author: Elon Musk
text: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

author: Larry Page
text: Always deliver more than expected.

author: Sergey Brin
text: Solving big problems is easier than solving little problems.

author: Paul Graham
text: Make something people want.

author: Sam Altman
text: The best way to get a good idea is to have lots of ideas.

author: Peter Thiel
text: Brilliant thinking is rare, but courage is in even shorter supply than genius.

author: Naval Ravikant
text: Play iterated games. All the returns in life, whether in wealth, relationships, or knowledge, come from compound interest.

author: Chris Dixon
text: What the smartest people do on the weekend is what everyone else will do during the week in ten years.

author: Marc Andreessen
text: In a startup, absolutely nothing happens unless you make it happen.

author: Fred Wilson
text: In the venture business, you learn more from the ones that don’t work than the ones that do.

author: Reid Hoffman
text: An entrepreneur is someone who will jump off a cliff and assemble an airplane on the way down.
